tasks.label: Connect Mosaic (VM)
args: net use M: /delete /y >NUL 2>&1 & net use M: "\\Mac\Mosaic" /persistent:no & "C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Teco\\Mosaic 2025.1\\Application\\VSC2m.exe" CONNECT

tasks.label: Disconnect Mosaic (VM)
args: net use M: /delete /y >NUL 2>&1 & net use M: "\\Mac\Mosaic" /persistent:no & "C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Teco\\Mosaic 2025.1\\Application\\VSC2m.exe" DISCONNECT
